page.title: 02ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Since the area is a popular tourist area many small craft workshops have been set up, producing well made, hand_crafted items for sale. In some craft workshops it is possible to watch craftsmen at work. Most craftsmen undertake commissioned work as well as producing large quantities of their best selling items. In Fishguard and district there can be found small art galleries and craft workshops producing pottery, ceramics, glass ware, leatherwork, woodwork, jewellery and original designs of knitwear. Traditional Welsh woollen cloth, tapestry and tweed is woven at a nearby woolen mill.
